document.masterDocTitle: New genera, species and records of Maeridae from Australian Waters: Austromaera, Ceradocus, Glossomaera, Hamimaera, Huonella gen. nov., Linguimaera and Maeraceterus gen. nov. (Crustacea: Amphipoda)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: New genera, species and records of Maeridae from Australian Waters: Austromaera, Ceradocus, Glossomaera, Hamimaera, Huonella gen. nov., Linguimaera and Maeraceterus gen. nov. (Crustacea: Amphipoda)

bibRefCitation.refString: Sheard, K. (1936) Amphipods from a South Australian reef. - Part 2. Transactions and Proceedings of the Royal Society of South Australia, 60, 173 - 179, pl. 117.

Distribution. Australia .
New South Wales
. Port Stephens (current study). Victoria : Western Port (current study).
South Australia
: Sellick's Beach; Gulf St Vincent; Spencer Gulf , Flinders Island ; Kangaroo Island ; Nuyts Archipelago, Yorke Peninsula; Fleurieu Penninsula; Tiparra Bay; Port Willunga; Port McDonnell; Ceduna ( Hale 1927 ; Sheard 1936 ; current study).
Western Australia
: Vancouver Peninsula (current study).
